home.title: THE LOST AND FOUND APP
home.description: The general purpose lost and found app that changes the way you recover your lost items. Anywhere, anytime, with anyone.

about.title: ABOUT IFOUND
about.p1: ifound was created by two friends with one shared belief:
about.p1Bold: nothing truly lost should stay lost.
about.p2Start: What began as a simple idea grew into a global mission to help people everywhere reconnect with what they've lost. From pets and wallets to personal belongings, stolen cars, and even missing people,
about.p2Bold: ifound brings all lost and found cases together in one powerful, worldwide platform.
about.p3Bold: first lost and found app to include people
about.p3End: , because we believe every life matters, and every search deserves a chance to be seen.
about.p4: ifound works because of community. The more people who join, the stronger it becomes. Every post, every share, and every alert increases the chances of a reunion.
about.p5: No matter your age, your country, or what you're searching for, ifound is here to help. Together, we're building a world where loss is met with hope, and finding becomes possible.
about.p6: ifound because someone, somewhere, is looking too.
about.p7End: , ifound is accessible to anyone, anywhere. No matter your age, your country, or what you're searching for.

privacy.title: PRIVACY POLICY
privacy.intro: At ifound, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our application.
privacy.infoCollectionText: We collect information that you provide directly to us when you create an account, report lost items, or communicate with establishments. This may include your name, email address, phone number, and descriptions of lost items.
privacy.howWeUseText: We use the information we collect to operate and improve our services, facilitate connections between users and establishments, communicate with you about your lost items, and ensure the security of our platform.
privacy.dataSharingText: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with partner establishments when you report a lost item or claim a found item, and with service providers who assist us in operating our platform.
privacy.securityText: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
privacy.yourRightsText: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You may also object to or restrict certain processing of your data.
privacy.contactText: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@ifound.com

partner.title: BECOME A PARTNER WITH IFOUND
partner.intro1: Every day, people lose important things in public places and many of them are found by staff before their owners ever realize where to look.
partner.intro2: Make your establishment part of the ifound community.
partner.intro3: Disco clubs, cafés, shopping malls, gyms, hotels, restaurants, and other public spaces can register their location on ifound and manage lost items digitally.
partner.intro4: Give visibility to your business and help those who need it most to recover what they've lost.
partner.successMessage: We'll get back to you soon.
partner.errorMessage: All fields are required to submit the form.

contact.title: CONTACT US
contact.intro: Have questions or need assistance? We're here to help!

faqs.title: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
faqs.a1: ifound is a platform that connects people who have lost items with establishments where those items were found. We help reunite people with their lost belongings quickly and efficiently.
faqs.a2: When you lose something at a partner establishment, their staff can register the found item on ifound. You can then search our database to see if your item has been found and arrange to collect it.
faqs.a3: Yes, ifound is completely free for users looking for their lost items. Our service is supported by our partner establishments.
faqs.q4: How can my business become a partner?
faqs.a4: You can apply to become a partner by filling out our partner application form. We work with various establishments including restaurants, cafés, gyms, hotels, and shopping malls.
faqs.q5: How long are found items kept?
faqs.a5: This depends on the individual partner establishment's policy. We recommend contacting the establishment directly for their specific retention policy.
faqs.q6: What types of items can be registered?
faqs.a6: Almost any personal item can be registered on ifound, including phones, wallets, keys, bags, jewelry, clothing, and more.
faqs.q7: How do I claim my lost item?
faqs.a7: Once you find your item on ifound, you'll need to contact the establishment directly to verify ownership and arrange collection.
faqs.a8: Yes, we take privacy seriously. Please review our Privacy Policy for detailed information about how we handle and protect your data.
